name: AS_GSS_DRM_BL_mapVendorDataForDataReconciliation
description: Rule to construct ref vendor to reconcile in JSON format
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isStateOrLocal: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_toJson_v1"(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: ri!vendorDataToBeReconciled,
      expression: if(
        local!isStateOrLocal,
        a!map(
          legalName: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
          TIN: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin],
          FEIN: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein],
          doingBusinessAs: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName],
          businessType: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes],
            expression: a!map(
              code: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode]
            )
          ),
          addressLine1: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
          addressLine2: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
          city: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
          state: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateCode]
            ),
            null,
            a!map(
              stateCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateCode]
            )
          ),
          country: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryCode]
            ),
            null,
            a!map(
              samGovCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.samGovCode],
              countryCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryCode]
            )
          ),
          zipCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
          zipCodeExt: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
          foreignPostal: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
          expirationDate: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
          appianStatus: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
        ),
        a!map(
          legalName: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
          UEI: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId],
          cage: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode],
          samGovStatus: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActiveInSAM],
          doingBusinessAs: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName],
          businessType: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes],
            expression: a!map(
              code: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode]
            )
          ),
          addressLine1: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
          addressLine2: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
          city: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
          state: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
              fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateCode]
            ),
            null,
            a!map(
              stateCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateCode]
            )
          ),
          country: if(
            or(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryCode]
              ),
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
                fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.samGovCode]
              )
            ),
            null,
            a!map(
              samGovCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.samGovCode],
              countryCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryCode]
            )
          ),
          zipCode: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
          zipCodeExt: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
          foreignPostal: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
          expirationDate: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
          appianStatus: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
